content: j jul-11 1111 l\ ol uv o ii - - - -- mini yip yip by rachel woodworth owner of fiberlicious creations what inspired me to make a mini yip yip version of the big yip yip by carissa browning was my sister which asked me if i could make mini ones after she saw the big ones so i recalculated the number of stitches and row and this is the results here are my notes in a neat fashion theses are characters from a children tv show from back in the 70 s and 80 s these can be used for decorations ear bud storage or anything you can think of yip yip yip uh huh uh huh uh huh materials needed 3 5 mm hook used to attach tentacles as well any worsted weight yam stitch marker pipe cleaner 2 small pompom in white 2 smaller pompom in black fabric glue scissors tapestry needle µu1-1111111t 1ove11y u finished measurements excluding the tentacles height approximately 4 inches talj circumference approximately 1 3/4 inches abbreviations chain= chain single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet dee = single_crochet decrease pm= place marker st s = stitches rs = right side ws = wrong side notes the body begins at the bottom center with a magic_ring and it is worked in continuous rounds until the base of the mouth opening the sides of the mouth is worked back and forth in row the very top of the head is worked in the round one last time then the tentacles the antennae and the eyes are attached afterwards instructions make a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring place stitch marker on first st move marker up to first st of each new round as you work round 2 2 single_crochet in each st- 12 sts j jul-111111 ic icivcii y\ cluster\ 11~ \ uiii round 3 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in following st to end - 18 sts round 4 single_crochet in tnch of next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in following st to end - 24 sts round 5 single_crochet into back loop of each st the tentacles will be attached to the front loops of this round round 6 single_crochet in each st repeat round 6 an additional 7 times row j4 single_crochet in next 6 sts turn row 15 chain 1 single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 14 sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts turn - 16 sts row 16 chain 1 single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 12 sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts tum - 14 sts row 17 chain i single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 10 sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts tum - 12 sts row 18 chain i single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 8 sts single_crochet dee in next 2 sts turn - 10 sts row 19 chain 1 single_crochet dee in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 6
